titles.title: There is a Rock that is higher than I,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a Rock that is higher than I,
The safest place I can run to.
When the storm is raging around,
There is no greater refuge.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is no Rock like our God,
Thereâ€™s no surer foundation.
There is no Rock like our God,
No other way to salvation.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For some You are the rock of offence,
For me You are a stronghold.
Some turn to others for strength,
But I have found out for certain.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So I will stand and hide myself,
In the secret place of the Rock.
And I will find my security,
In the Rock that is higher than I.
